snippet: Stick with the traditional partition? What color should the meter cover be? At planning meetings for the Taxi of Tomorrow, no detail was too banal to debate.
abstract: Contingent of New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission officials has been working closely with designers at Nissan, which will be the sole manufacturer of New York City's 13,000 taxicabs beginning in late 2013; prototype for the Nissan NV 200, which medallion owners will be required to buy as they retire existing cabs, will be officially unveiled at the New York auto show.
lead_paragraph: Stick with the traditional partition? What color should the meter cover be? At planning meetings for the Taxi of Tomorrow, no detail was too banal to debate.
